https://tmrev.io/movie/1020641-Déjà Vu: Surveillance Window 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Divided into 10 segments we hear from cast and crew. We learn about filming the opening ferry explosion, Washington's character and performance, makeup and costumes, the Time Lab and technological issues, the car chase, shooting in New Orleans, the Washington/Bruckheimer/Scott collaboration, physical sequences, and the concluding ferry scene. Déjà Vu: Surveillance Window
